General.Name: Suzhou Anjie Technology Co Ltd
General.Description: Suzhou Anjie Technology Co., Ltd. engages in the research, development, production, and sale of intelligent terminal components in China and internationally. It operates through four segments: Intelligent Terminal Functional Parts and Precision Structural Parts and Module Products; New Energy Vehicle Product; Information Storage Product; and Other. The company offers precision functional devices, and precision structural parts and modules; consumer electronics products and smart terminals, such as new energy vehicles and information storage devices. It offers its products for smartphones, laptops, tablets, all-in-ones, virtual reality/augmented reality devices. The company was incorporated in 1999 and is headquartered in Suzhou, China.
